Home_Page.title: My account
Home_Page.heading: My Account homepage
Home_Page.guidance_text: This is your account homepage where you can access your workspaces

Label_Texts.approvals_hint_label: Workspace for approvals service staff to receive and process applications and post approval activity for review.
Label_Texts.cag_members_hint_label: Workspace for members to review applications and post approval activity.
Label_Texts.cat_hint_label: Workspace for CAT staff to receive and process applications and post approval activity for review.
Label_Texts.memeber_management_hint_label: Workspace for staff to view and update committee member records.
Label_Texts.my_research_hint_label: Workspace to view and manage the research I am responsible for.
Label_Texts.rec_members_hint_label: Workspace for members to review applications and post approval activity.
Label_Texts.sponsor_hint_label: Workspace to view, manage and authorise the research I am responsible for.
Label_Texts.system_administration_hint_label: Workspace for system administrators to view and manage system administration functions.
Label_Texts.technical_assurance_hint_label: Workspace for Technical Assurance staff to receive and process applications and post approval activity for review.
Label_Texts.technical_assurance_reviewers_hint_label: Workspace for Technical Assurance reviewers to review applications and post approval activity.
